mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ai_key WHERE provider = #{provider} AND is_active = TRUE ORDER BY priority ASC, error_count ASC
SELECT * FROM ai_key ORDER BY provider, priority ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_key (provider, account_email, project_name, api_key, priority, is_active) VALUES (#{provider}, #{accountEmail}, #{projectName}, #{apiKey}, #{priority}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_key SET provider = #{provider}, account_email = #{accountEmail}, project_name = #{projectName}, api_key = #{apiKey}, priority = #{priority}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE ai_key_id = #{aiKeyId}
UPDATE ai_key SET last_used_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE ai_key_id = #{aiKeyId}
UPDATE ai_key SET error_count = error_count + 1, last_error_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE ai_key_id = #{aiKeyId}
UPDATE ai_key SET error_count = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE ai_key_id = #{aiKeyId}
UPDATE ai_key SET is_active = FALSE, updated_at = NOW() WHERE ai_key_id = #{aiKeyId}
UPDATE ai_key SET is_active = TRUE, error_count = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE ai_key_id = #{aiKeyId}
